text: Polydor Records is a record label currently based in the UK, and is a subsidiary of Universal Music Group. ==Polydor UK== Though Polydor's American branch is gone, in the United Kingdom, however, Polydor continues to sign chart-topping acts and remains one of the strongest imprints in the country â€” with artists such as Klaxons, Sophie Ellis-Bextor, Take That and Kaiser Chiefs. It also acts as the UK label for American-based acts under Interscope- Geffen-A&M; like Eminem and Gwen Stefani. In spring 2006, Polydor launched Fascination Records, a music label dedicated to pop music. Both Girls Aloud and Sophie Ellis-Bextor transferred to the new label. ==Related pages== * Polydor Records artists * List of record labels == Other websites == * UK official site Category:British record labels
title: Polydor Records
